item.title: Dockerize the Full-Stack application built using PowerShell (Pode & PSHTML)
item.description: Introduction I have recorded the demonstration of spinning up the full-stack application built using PowerShell (Pode & PSHTML). Feel free to leave your comments Disclaimer This blog post is the output of my learning on Docker, MySQL, docker-compose, and MiniKube. So, please skip asking why not native or alternatives?.
